item.title: My First Poem
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog

This is my first blog post using Hugo! I’m excited to share my thoughts and experiences with you.

Why Hugo?

Hugo is a powerful static site generator that makes it easy to create fast and beautiful websites

item.title: My First Poem
item.description:
A Starlit Night

In the quiet of the evening light,
The stars awake and sparkle bright.
Whispers of dreams in the cool night air, A universe vast, a world so fair.
